mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xihu_order_uuid_number as xihuOrderUuidNumber ,a.xihu_id as xihuId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.buy_number as buyNumber ,a.xihu_order_true_price as xihuOrderTruePrice ,a.xihu_order_types as xihuOrderTypes ,a.xihu_order_payment_types as xihuOrderPaymentTypes ,a.yuyue_time as yuyueTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
